CustomField.description: Formula field to pull the Product or Product Options's MaxOSCapacity(AdditionalChargeThreshold). Used with Price Rule to set Quantity of Additional Attendee Product.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula field to pull the Product or Product Options's MaxOSCapacity(AdditionalChargeThreshold). Used with Price Rule to set Quantity of Additional Attendee Product.
CustomField.label: MaxOSCapacity(AdditionalChargeThreshold)
